subjects.name: Chemistry
subjects.description: The scientific study of the properties and behavior of matter.

topics.title: Introduction to Analytical Chemistry
topics.content: Overview of qualitative and quantitative analysis methods.

sections.title: Precipitation Gravimetry
sections.content:
Precipitation Gravimetry

This method involves isolating an ion in solution by a precipitation reaction, filtering, washing, drying, and weighing the precipitate.

sections.title: Volatilization Gravimetry
sections.content:
Volatilization Gravimetry

In this method, the analyte is separated from other constituents of the sample by converting it to a gas of known chemical composition.

sections.title: Electrogravimetry
sections.content:
Electrogravimetry

The analyte is separated by deposition on an electrode by an electrical current.

topics.title: Volumetry (Titrimetry)
topics.content:
1. Apparatus: Burette, Pipette.
2. Reaction Types: Acid-Base, Redox.

subjects.name: Computer Science
subjects.description: The study of computation, automation, and information.
